About the Company: Nila Infrastructure Ltd. is engaged primarily in the business of real estate, construction of housing projects and urban infrastructure development. The Companys operation includes real estates and infrastructure. The Company specializes in the business bands of residential real estate and urban infrastructure. The Company develops its own residential projects, as well as undertakes construction contracts for reputed private developers and government institutions. During the year ended March 31, 2012, public infrastructure projects, the Company is engaged in include bus shelters of Ahmedabad Bus Rapid Transit System (BRTS) and Ahmedabad Municipal Transport Service (AMTS), a textile park in Surat and media utilities in Rajkot.
